entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending early this evening then clearing. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 13 March 2023
